ingredients.item: 400g can essential Waitrose Cannellini Beans, drained and rinsed
50g White, Black and Red Quinoa Mix

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a saucepan and fry the carrot and leek for 3-4 minutes.
Add the beans, stock and quinoa and bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 20 minutes until the vegetables and quinoa are tender. Serve.
